summary_text: 갑 제1호증: 홍콩 특별행정구 세무국(Inland Revenue Department) 발행 거주자 증명서(Certificate of Residence for the Avoidance of Double Taxation). 발급일: 2024년 7월 1일. 성명: KIM TAE JOON, 홍콩 신분증 번호: Z123456(7), 홍콩 주소: Flat 12B, Block 3, Dynasty Court, 23 Waterloo Road, Kowloon Tong, Hong Kong. 증명 내용: The above-named person was a resident of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region for the purpose of the Arrangement between the Mainland of China and the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region for the Avoidance of Double Taxation and the Prevention of Fiscal Evasion with respect to Taxes on Income during the period from 1 January 2023 to 31 December 2023. 서명: 홍콩 세무국장(Commissioner of Inland Revenue). 본 증명서는 한국-홍콩 조세조약 제4조에 따른 거주자 지위 입증 목적으로 발급됨.
